text: this week's world brings you world
events with a difference sharing stories
and ideas you might have missed what
happens to Saudi Arabia when oil becomes
cheap in America or why could the birth
of fewer babies slow down the economy is
nationalism on the rise is free speech
in peril so how about a new show that
realizes the world is no longer abroad
this week's world with me Emily mate
less and guests here in our warehouse
will launch on the fourteenth of May
with a new episode available every
Saturday right here on YouTube directly
